name: Error Tag
title: ERROR TAG
definition: Identifies a specific field or unique identification scheme for the error message provided in the ERROR MESSAGE field.
validEntryNotes: The valid entry “SVC-ADDR” indicates one or more data elements associated with the service address on the SALI Form is in error. In lieu of “SVC- ADDR”, the specific ASOG data element may be used (e.g., CITY) as stated in Note 2.
Identifies the name of the field (e.g., NCI) in error as shown in the ASOG.
Identifies an error condition that cannot be mapped to a specific ASOG data element.
usageNotes: Required when the CNT field is “E” or “F”, otherwise prohibited.
